title: Validation of Emergency Obstetric Care Access Deprivation in Kano, Nigeria
description: This dataset contains user-contributed validations of modelled outputs for emergency obstetric care access deprivation in Kano, Nigeria. The data was exported from the IDEAMAPS Data Ecosystem platform and includes responses from participants with varied backgrounds.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the validation record.

fields.name: created_at
fields.description: Timestamp when the validation was submitted.

fields.name: validation
fields.description: User-assigned validation score for the model output. Scale: 0 = Low, 1 = Medium, 2 = High.

fields.name: user_id
fields.description: Anonymized unique identifier for the user who submitted the validation.

fields.name: user_background
fields.description: The background of the user, e.g. ['Research'], ['Community Member'], etc.

fields.name: user_map_usage
fields.description: Self-reported user experience level with map-based data (e.g., 1 = Low, 2 = Medium, 3 = High).

fields.name: output_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the model output that was validated.

fields.name: output_model
fields.description: Identifier for the underlying model that generated the output.

fields.name: output_model_city_name
fields.description: City name associated with the model output.

fields.name: output_model_city_country
fields.description: Country where the city is located.

fields.name: output_model_subdomain_name
fields.description: Thematic subdomain of the model output (e.g., Emergency Obstetric Care Access Deprivation).

fields.name: output_result
fields.description: Model-derived classification of deprivation (categorical or index-based).

fields.name: output_latitude
fields.description: Latitude coordinate of the validated location.

fields.name: output_longitude
fields.description: Longitude coordinate of the validated location.
